mapper.insert: INSERT INTO answer(answerno, content, rdate, inquiryno, memberno) VALUES (answer_seq.nextval, #{content}, sysdate , #{inquiryno}, #{memberno})
mapper.select: SELECT answerno, content, rdate, inquiryno, memberno FROM answer ORDER BY inquiryno ASC
SELECT answerno, content, rdate, inquiryno, memberno FROM answer WHERE inquiryno = #{inquiryno} ORDER BY inquiryno ASC
SELECT answerno, content, rdate, inquiryno, memberno FROM answer WHERE inquiryno = #{inquiryno} ORDER BY answerno DESC
SELECT answerno, content, rdate, inquiryno, memberno FROM answer WHERE memberno = #{memberno} ORDER BY inquiryno ASC
